description: Secretary of State John Kerry said his visit to a memorial for those killed by American atomic bombs in 1945 reflected the strength of Japan’s present-day alliance with the United States.
title: Kerry Visits Hiroshima Memorial
title_page: Kerry Visits Hiroshima Memorial - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Secretary of State John Kerry said his visit to a memorial for those killed by American atomic bombs in 1945 reflected the strength of Japan’s present-day alliance with the United States.
